name: retro_roguelike_game
description:
This game was made for the Game on Web 2022 Contest

You are a magician seeking power in a cursed dungeon. Increase your strength by collecting power-ups left by monsters to slay the dragon.

Take care! The dungeon changes configuration with each new attempt, making it unique.

Once Level 4 is reached, you will unlock the infinite mode + as well as the character of the magician.

Controls
KeyboardGamepadMovewasdleft joystick
Projectilearrow keys
right joystick

Game and art by Dakharr, Nicolas Lanoux and Joël Galigne

Music by Nathan Miniere
